hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash echo "This is from the ASR Job"
sleep 10s
echo "Creating the build workspace................................................................................." cd "/tmp/$workingdir" mkdir "./ASR" cd "./ASR" cp "/tmp/$workingdir/Initial/asrpublicip.txt" "./asrpublicip.txt" pwd
echo "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________" echo "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________" echo "Downloading the deployment file from github................................................................................."
#curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/alihhussain/AzureTemplates/master/Automation%20Demo/VMCustomData/Step3/asrdeploy.py #asrdns=$(sudo cat asrpublicip.txt) #sed -i "s#{asrpublicip}#$asrdns#g" asrdeploy.py #sed -i "s#{appid}#$appId#g" asrdeploy.py #sed -i "s#{tenant}#$tenant#g" asrdeploy.py
curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/alihhussain/AzureTemplates/master/Automation%20Demo/VMCustomData/Step3/AzurePInstallAndAsrCredGet.ps1 sed -i "s#{appid}#$appId#g" AzurePInstallAndAsrCredGet.ps1 sed -i "s#{tenant}#$tenant#g" AzurePInstallAndAsrCredGet.ps1
#Creating the location for custom configuration file mkdir "/var/lib/jenkins/userContent/buildparameters/$workingdir" mv "/tmp/$workingdir/ASR/AzurePInstallAndAsrCredGet.ps1" "/var/lib/jenkins/userContent/buildparameters/$workingdir"
configfilelocation="http://cim-jenkins.eastus.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/userContent/buildparameters/$workingdir/AzurePInstallAndAsrCredGet.ps1" curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/alihhussain/AzureTemplates/master/Automation%20Demo/VMCustomData/Step3/customextension2.json sed -i "s#{custom_config_file}#$configfilelocation#g" customextension2.json
echo "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________" echo "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________"
echo "Deploying to ASR Windows Instance....." cat "/var/lib/jenkins/userContent/buildparameters/$workingdir/AzurePInstallAndAsrCredGet.ps1"
#az vm extension set --resource-group $ResourceName --vm-name MyASRVM --name customScript --publisher Microsoft.Azure.Extensions --settings ./customextension2.json sudo /root/bin/az vm extension set -n CustomScriptExtension --publisher Microsoft.Compute --version 1.4 --vm-name MyASRVM --resource-group $ResourceName --settings ./customextension2.json
#python asrdeploy.py
echo "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________" echo "______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________"
#curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/alihhussain/AzureTemplates/master/Automation%20Demo/VMCustomData/Step3/copy_asr_cred_dl.py #sed -i "s#{asrpublicip}#$asrdns#g" copy_asr_cred_dl.py #python copy_asr_cred_dl.py
echo "The Azure Resources for ASR are deployed."
